data.address: Residential Property/ Plot Khasra No.-276, situated at Village-Ghukna, Pargana-Loni, Tehsil  and  Distt-Ghaziabad and also The Constructions and Super structures to be built and already built thereon, together with all rights of easements of all kinds appurtenant thereton in name of Mrs. Usha W/o Mr. Pramod Kumar Yadav.
